mapper.sql: mid, mname, url, path, iconCls, enabled, parent_mid, create_date, cteate_id,menu_type,btn_class,btn_type
mapper.select: select m.*,r.rid,r.rname,r.rname_zh from admin_menu m left join admin_rule_menu mr on m.`mid`= mr.`mid` left join admin_rule r on mr.`rid`= r.`rid` WHERE m.`enabled`=2
mapper.update: update admin_menu set mname = #{mname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, iconCls = #{iconcls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_mid = #{parentMid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, menu_type =#{menuType}, btn_type = #{btnType}, btn_class =#{btnClass} where mid = #{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select mid,mname,iconCls,parent_mid from admin_menu where enabled = 2
select mid,mname,iconCls,parent_mid from admin_menu where enabled = 2 and menu_type =1
select rmid,mid,rid from admin_rule_menu where rid =#{rid}

SELECT m.mid, m.mname, m.url, m.path, m.iconCls, m.enabled, m.parent_mid, m.create_date, m.cteate_id, m.menu_type,m.btn_class,m.btn_type,a.name AS createName,b.mname parentName FROM admin_menu m LEFT JOIN admin_info a ON m.cteate_id = a.id LEFT JOIN admin_menu b ON b.mid = m.parent_mid where 1=1
and m.mname like CONCAT('%',trim(#{mname}),'%')
